Package com.qoppa.ocr

OCR bridge integration.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OCRBridge
    This class provides method to configure and use the Tesseract OCR engine.
    OCROptions
    This object holds the settings to be applied when performing OCR.
    TessJNI
    This class provides a native interface to the Tesseract OCR engine.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OCRException
    General exception thrown when there are any errors while performing OCR on a PDF document.
